name: c4nhanes
short_description: The national health and nutrition examination survey (NHANES) is done by the center for national health statistics.  Data is made available for public use by this group for research; however, it is in a format that is not universible accessible.  This provides the data in a simple format as well as a set of tools to manipulate the data.  It can interface with open office and libreoffice using their csv filter.
summary: command line tools for processing tab delimitted statistics
